name: I Can Crit Infinitely
author: 三界动画
content: Lin Jing, who arrived in a fantasy world, faced hostilities from rival sects, betrayal from fellow disciples, and the burden of accompanying a sect’s daughter who had lost all her cultivation. Fortunately, he possessed the power of the “Critical Strike System.” With this system’s blessing, everything he did—be it attacking, defending, moving swiftly, cultivating, alchemy, or enlightenment—could trigger critical strike effects! No matter how formidable his foes were, they couldn’t withstand this
